115030004.text: The initial results are back. This entity born out of space distortions is called a Calyx

115030005.text: Such entities may contain reality data that has practical value. Exercise extreme caution when you come into contact with it. The very nature of spatial distortion is inexplicable chaos, and it's quite difficult to tell if there are any elements of danger hidden within

115040001.text: Mr. Yang, this one looks different from the normal Calyxes...
115040001.option: Mr. Yang, this one looks different from the normal Calyxes...

115040002.text: Hmm, the spawns from this one are of a different species. The materials they produce are actually worth a lot of money

115050002.text: This type of Calyx is very sought-after. It exudes a substance that can stabilize Light Cones

115050003.text: If you find anything curious during your adventure, show it to me. The things you've found so far are all very interesting...

115100001.text: Mr. Yang, is this also a Calyx?

115100002.text: Yes. Remember, I mentioned that there are many different kinds of Calyxes, and the reality data stored in them may vary

115100003.text: Remember to be thoroughly prepared before you make physical contact with them. It's not gonna be worth it if you get yourself hurt out of avarice

115110002.text: Stagnant Shadows are entities that have been influenced by Fragmentum energy and are confined within static space-time

115110003.text: Once external forces get involved, the space-time within the Shadows will start to flow again, meaning the imprisoned creature or monster may regain activity

115110004.text: I wouldn't recommend anyone to make contact with the Shadows unless they are genuinely interested in certain priceless relics captured by the Shadows. Just be careful, {NICKNAME}

115120002.text: It appears to be a rift in space, torn open by the Fragmentum as it erodes reality. The scientific name for this phenomenon is "Cavern of Corrosion"

115120003.text: No one knows for sure what kind of space the Caverns are connected to. However, research does indicate that valuable reality data is often scattered within these Caverns

115120004.text: As with the Calyxes, the derivatives of the Fragmentum always carry unidentified risks. Please exercise extra caution if you wish to explore further

115140000.text: {NICKNAME}, we've received some assignments. Looks like some planets could use our help.

115140003.text: The Nameless are always happy to help those in need.

115140005.text: And we do so without taking any credit.

115170000.text: {NICKNAME}, it's time to teach you how to better wield the power of your Path.

115180000.text: Do you feel like you are stuck? You've reached what people call a "plateau," {NICKNAME}.

115180001.text: While I don't claim to be an expert in this, I do have some tips to share.

115180002.text: Try it out. Have faith in yourself. I'm sure you can surpass even your greatest expectations.

115190000.text: Light Cones are sections of time. They possess great power.

115190001.text: I think you're ready to learn how to use Light Cones.

111170000.text: Mr. Yang, are you there? Mr. Yaaaang~

111170003.text: I have been here the entire time. What's the matter, {NICKNAME}?

111170004.text: Does our Express welcome new members?
111170004.option: Does the Express welcome new members?

111170006.text: Oh? I'd, of course, welcome them

111170008.text: However, do you mind if I ask some questions?

111170009.text: I'm curious. What kind of friend did you make, {NICKNAME}?

111170010.text: She's a mechanical prodigy with a meticulous mind

111170013.text: I suppose that means she will have a lot in common with Himeko. That's not bad

111170016.text: Anyhow, I would like to welcome your friend

111170017.text: However, I'm not the decision maker here, but I will put in a good word for you with Himeko

111170018.text: In my experience, she shouldn't have much objection. So don't worry

111170021.text: No need to thank me. It's the least I can do

111170011.text: She's a rock star with an uninhibited personality

111170014.text: Oh? That's a pretty good hobby. I myself am interested as well

111170012.text: She's... I can't say for sure

111170015.text: It matters not. I trust your judgment of character, it shouldn't be too far off

111170005.text: I have a friend who wants to board the Express. What do you think, Mr. Yang?
111170005.option: I have a friend who wants to join...

111170007.text: Oh? Making friends here is always a wonderful thing. I welcome any addition of new members

111240001.text: I have a question for you.\nDid March, Dan Heng, and you see anything extraordinary in the mountains north of Belobog?

111240002.text: There was a giant robot called the Engine of Creation
111240002.option: We saw the Engine of Creation

111240003.text: That might be what we are looking for. It would be good if I can witness it with my own eyes.\nMaybe it's possible to get it re-activated

111240004.text: If possible, I would like to drive it around...

111240005.text: I'm sorry. I went off on a tangent

111240013.text: After the blizzard on Jarilo-VI weakened, Himeko and I detected an unidentified signal there but were unable to decipher its contents

111240014.text: Considering the fact that this planet has just gone through the crisis of Stellaron and is still not stable yet, it would be troubling if this signal were to attract malicious parties to this location.\nWould you kindly go have a look when you've got the chance?

111240015.text: No problem. I'll go have a look.

111240016.text: Thank you. Himeko and I will have some rewards ready for you once you get back

111240019.text: I have sent the rough coordinates of the signal to you. Thank you for your trouble

111240017.text: It's so far and so much hassle. Will Mr. Yang and Himeko at least offer me some modest benefits?

111240018.text: Hahaha, don't worry.\nHimeko and I will get some rewards ready by the time you return

111240006.text: I recall that there was a device to imprison the Stellaron
111240006.option: We saw a device to imprison the Stellaron

111240007.text: The Stellaron is indeed capable of releasing unusual electromagnetic waves. Maybe that is what we are looking for

111240010.text: I think I saw lots of March 8ths

111240012.text: Oh. Dan Heng may have indeed mentioned this in the records. It's the Antimatter Legion frozen in the Eternal Freeze, right?\nIt is indeed extraordinary, but probably not what we are looking for

200100000.text: {NICKNAME}, do you have a moment? I have a favor to ask.

200100001.text: Okay Mr. Yang, let's hear it
200100001.option: Okay Mr. Yang, let's hear it

200100002.text: Do you know how to change your profile picture?

200100005.text: If {NICKNAME} doesn't know, then I doubt anyone does.

200100008.text: What do you want to change your profile picture to, Mr. Yang?
200100008.option: What do you want to change your profile picture to?

200100012.text: This is the earliest version of the animation.

200100017.text: Although the calendar here is different from that of my hometown, I have calculated that the anniversary of the premiere of Arahato is coming up soon.

200100018.text: I did so many takes to get my new profile picture ready for the anniversary, but I never imagined that...

200100020.text: It's time for the Express to have its own internal communication app.

200100009.text: Is changing your profile picture important?

200100010.text: Absolutely! And extraordinarily so to me.

200100006.text: Ah, I can't find the Customer Service function either.

200110001.text: When we step on the Express and follow in the footsteps of the Nameless, it means that we will become accustomed to things that are not of the ordinary.

200110002.text: You will push beyond your limits without even realizing it.

200110003.text: {NICKNAME}, have you experienced anything like that before?

200110004.text: Indeed, I have suddenly started receiving a huge volume of messages
200110004.option: I have suddenly started receiving a huge volume of messages.

200110006.text: Messages represent the connection between people.

200110007.text: If you receive messages every day, it means that the connection between you and others has deepened during your Trailblaze journey.

200110008.text: But connections also need to be maintained. Take care to manage your time wisely.

200110012.text: Sounds like you're a seasoned veteran, Mr. Yang!
200110012.option: Sounds like you're a seasoned veteran

200110014.text: The experience of the Nameless is but a lesson of sweat and blood.

200110013.text: If this is the price of following Trailblaze, I'm willing to pay it!
200110013.option: Such is the price of following Trailblaze

200110016.text: To have attained such enlightenment at such a young age.

200110005.text: Indeed, I have suddenly started receiving many new assignments
200110005.option: I have suddenly started receiving many new assignments.

200110009.text: You can't count yourself as worthy of the Nameless if you can't handle several assignments at the same time.

200110010.text: Plan your route efficiently so that you won't run around the same circle twice. Otherwise, you're just doing extra work.

200110011.text: Before you know it, you'll have already developed the muscle memory for it.

200120000.text: {NICKNAME}, I just got a great idea!

200120001.text: We can make an animation based on the Express!

200120006.text: Of course, the story would take place in the distant past.

200120007.text: And for obvious, practical reasons, we will most likely need to modify most of the plot in the end... but that's just an afterthought.

200120008.text: I've been out of the industry for a long time now, and frankly, I'm especially interested in hearing what you young people think.

200120009.text: For example, what would you find most compelling in such a story?

200120010.text: It should be an adventure with ups and downs
200120010.option: An adventure with ups and downs

200120013.text: Unique settings and a collision of destinies â€” can't do without either of those.

200120016.text: Next question: When do you think this story should end?

200120020.text: Maybe you could serialize it? That sort of thing has been done before.

200120023.text: I'm actually really glad that you see our journey that way.

200120024.text: Looks like I'll have to make this dream come true after my next retirement...

200120025.text: {NICKNAME}, wait until that time comes, and then we'll have a nice chat again.

200120021.text: After reaching a satisfying conclusion... stories like that have been told before in animation.

200120019.text: When everyone's equipment is fully upgraded
200120019.option: When everyone's equipment is fully upgraded

200120022.text: If the story is forced to continue after everyone's equipment has been fully upgraded, the battles may become unbalanced.

200120011.text: It should be a thrilling, relentless battle

200120014.text: Companions who have each other's backs, and powerful enemies â€” can't do without either of those.

200120012.text: In truth, I just want to see the protagonist fully upgrade their equipment
200120012.option: I want to see the protagonist fully upgrade their equipment

200120015.text: That is, the protagonist keeps getting upgrades and getting stronger, right?

200120005.text: Hear me out on this one.

115030002.text: It is a Calyx, a strange entity born from the phenomenon of space distortion.

115030003.text: There are some reality data in the Calyxes that might come in handy, but please be careful when coming in contact with them. The existence of these Calyxes is still a mystery to us, and the danger within is incalculable.

115030006.text: In your coming journey, you might come across other Calyxes like this, and the reality data stored in different Calyxes may vary, so look out for that.

info.name: Welt
info.signature: Everyone on the Express, please constantly keep in touch
